choose.when: SELECT r.* FROM recipe r JOIN user u ON r.user_num = u.user_num WHERE u.user_nickname LIKE '%'||#{userNickname}||'%'

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recipe (user_num, pet_num, rcp_title, rcp_content, serving_size, cooking_time, cooking_level, ingredients, rcp_viewCount, rcp_regdate, main_path) VALUES (#{userNum}, #{petNum}, #{title}, #{content}, #{servingSize}, #{cookingTime}, #{cookingLevel}, #{ingredients}, #{viewCount}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{mainPath})
mapper.select:
SELECT r.rcp_num AS rcpNum, r.user_num AS userNum, r.rcp_title AS title, r.main_path AS mainPath, u.user_nickname AS userNickname FROM recipe r JOIN user u ON r.user_num = u.user_num
ORDER BY r.rcp_num DESC

SELECT r.rcp_num AS rcpNum, r.user_num AS userNum, r.rcp_title AS title, r.rcp_content AS content, r.serving_size AS servingSize, r.cooking_time AS cookingTime, r.cooking_level AS cookingLevel, r.ingredients, r.rcp_viewCount AS viewCount, r.rcp_regdate AS regdate,r.main_path AS mainPath, u.user_nickname AS userNickname FROM recipe r JOIN user u ON r.user_num = u.user_num WHERE r.rcp_num=#{rcpNum}

SELECT r.rcp_num AS rcpNum, r.user_num AS userNum, r.rcp_title AS title, r.main_path AS mainPath, u.user_nickname AS userNickname FROM recipe r JOIN user u ON r.user_num = u.user_num WHERE r.user_num = #{userNum} ORDER BY r.rcp_num DESC
